TopicTitle: Struts, landing struts, and all extendable parts auto-extend themselves.

Articles.Content: When I place a strut onto a rocket or aircraft, it appears to be sticking out as if it were attached, but I can still place the other end of the strut. If I grab a part that can be extended (such as landing struts and antenna),  it appears to be already extended, but I can extend it into itself. It is like the is a frozen image of the extended part, and I can interact with a duplicate that is stuck within it. I have the restock mods downloaded,  and I was thinking  that it is a visual bug that comes from multiple  texture mods? I am not sure.  I have many graphical mods, such as scatterer and EVE, but I do not think those mods are the issue.  Could someone please help me with this?

7 minutes ago, kspAddict_ said:

I FIXED IT YIPPEE HOORAY!!!!!

This is the best type of KSP victory—figuring something out for yourself. I'm glad you were able to do it. I was going to ask you about parts mods—even small ones can cause issues. And welcome to our forum community.
